cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.current_location: about 475 miles ESE of Isla Beata, Dominican Republic
cyclone.trajectory: continuing west-northwest across the eastern and central Caribbean, then slowing and turning northwest toward Jamaica, eastern-central Cuba and eventually the eastern Gulf of Mexico/Florida peninsula early next week

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane and tropical-storm watches/warnings limited to Hispaniola, Jamaica, Cuba and parts of the eastern Caribbean – none north of Florida
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane warnings for southern Hispaniola, Jamaica; tropical-storm warnings for parts of Haiti and Dominican Republic – none north of Florida
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Eastern and central Caribbean coasts, then Cuba and potentially the Florida Gulf coast
